bahasa.deskripsiManajemen: Lahir di Semarang, 26 Desember 1938, meraih Sarjana Hukum dari Fakultas Hukum UI tahun 1967. Melanjutkan studi dengan kursus singkat di Norwegian Shipping Academy, Sanderstolen, Norwegian, dan Seatrade Academy of London, Cambridge, Inggris.

Merupakan Presiden Indonesia kelima yang menjabat sejak 23 Juli 2001 sampai 20 Oktober 2004. Ia merupakan presiden wanita Indonesia pertama dan putri dari presiden Indonesia pertama, Soekarno, yang kemudian mengikuti jejak ayahnya menjadi Presiden Indonesia

Guru besar emeritus Fakultas Ilmu Budaya UI, ahli linguistik Indonesia, analisis wacana, penerjemahan, dan semiotika. Mantan ketua Himpunan Penerjemah Indonesia (2000–2007), anggota AIPI, dan pendiri Lingkaran Semiotik. Juga, ahli musik jazz dan pemain harmonika

Tokoh Kepolisian Republik Indonesia (Polri) dan akademikus. Ia pernah menjabat sebagai Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) pada periode 1978 sampai 1982, sebagai Menteri Tenaga Kerja pada Kabinet Ampera (1966), dan juga pernah ditugaskan sebagai Duta Besar untuk Jerman Barat.

Akademisi transportasi dan alumni Technische Hogeschool Delft, Belanda (1952-1958), Universitas Purdue, AS (1960-1961), dan Institute For Theoretical Physics, Trieste (1973). Dosen ITB (1959), Instruktur Wing Pendidikan 006, TNI-AU (1959-1965), Penasihat Dinas Kelaikan Udara Ditjen Perhubungan Udara (1959-1968).
Wakil Presiden Komite Olimpiade Indonesia, juga aktif di Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, berperan dalam pengembangan olahraga dan pendidikan.

bahasa.namaLengkapManajemen: Prof. Dr. H. Does Sampoerno MPH
bahasa.deskripsiManajemen: Perintis Program Studi Kesehatan Masyarakat di Fakultas Kedokteran, Unsri. Sebagai pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, berkontribusi besar pada pendidikan kesehatan dan Indonesia sehat.

Soebronto Laras, pembalap dan mekanik dikenal sebagai Yonto, anak R. Moerdono importir mobil Citroen, Tempo, dan Combi sejak 1949. Sejak kecil tertarik bengkel, Yonto menjabat Direktur Utama PT. Indohero Steel & Engineering Co., dan PT Indo Mobil Utama, perakit motor dan mobil Suzuki. Juga, Presiden Komisaris Indomobil Group dan Suzuki Indomobil Motor.

Lahir di Bandung, 27 November 1933, ahli konstruksi beton, pendiri Universitas Gadjah Mada dan Yayasan Perguruan Cikini. Sarjana Muda Kedokteran UI (1955), Sarjana Psikologi UI (1962), Sarjana Filsafat Rijk Universiteit, Leiden, Belanda (1974), Doktor Filsafat UI (1979).

Prof. Mardjono, Ketua Program Kajian Ilmu Kepolisian Pascasarjana UI (1996—2006), Sekretaris dan Ketua Konsorsium Ilmu Hukum Departemen Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (1990—2002). Sarjana Hukum UI 1962, Master of Arts dari University of Pennsylvania 1967.

Pembicara di Lokakarya Majelis Penilai PP PII, betonisasi sertifikat insinyur dan rekam kinerja. Bagian dari pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, ia mendukung budaya profesional dan ketatnya regulasi keprofesian.
President Director PT PLN Geothermal, pemimpin energi, juga berperan dalam pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, menunjukkan kontribusi di bidang pendidikan dan energi.
Pengusaha tambang dan pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, menopang kesuksesan istri, Iin Parlina, penyanyi legendaris. Dalam kebahagiaan keluarga, keduanya aktif dalam kegiatan sosial dan amal.

Hoediatmo Hoed, ekonom dan profesional Indonesia, pernah menjabat sebagai direktur utama PT. Freeport Indonesia, perusahaan modal asing pertama pada zaman Orde Baru. Menggantikan Usman Pamuntjak, Hoediatmo Hoed digantikan oleh Adrianto Machribie pada 1996 setelah kerusuhan di Tembagapura dan Timika.

Ir. Budiono Kartohadiprojo, mantan Ketua Umum Korps Menwa Indonesia, memegang peran sentral dalam membangkitkan kesadaran bela negara dan pertahanan NKRI. Sebagai CEO PT. Era Media Informasi, ia juga aktif dalam dunia media, menunjukkan kontribusinya pada pemahaman dan penyiaran informasi.

bahasa.namaLengkapManajemen: DR. Ir. Darwin Cyril Noerhadi, M.Sc
bahasa.deskripsiManajemen: Merupakan Konsultan & Peneliti di Harvard Institute for International Development (HIID) – Departemen Keuangan. Gelar Doktor di bidang Strategic Management (cum laude) dari Universitas Indonesia, MBA bidang Keuangan dan Ekonomi dari University of Houston, dan Sarjana Teknik dari Institut Teknologi Bandung.

Merupakan anggota dari Ikatan Dokter Indonesia (IDI) dan Perhimpunan Dokter Spesialis Rehabilitasi Medis Indonesia (PERDOSRI).Beliau juga mengikuti pendidikan lainnya seperti Child Development and Rehabilitation di Royal Children's Hospital, Melbourn, Australia
Norem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam eu turpis molestie, dictum est a, mattis tellus.
Dirut PT Indonesia Power, tokoh energi Indonesia, insinyur berpengalaman. Pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, menekankan dedikasi pada pertumbuhan perusahaan dan pendidikan masyarakat.

Pejuang TNI AU, putra Marsekal Muda TNI Prof. Abdurrahman Saleh, dikenal sebagai tokoh perintis. Sebagai bagian pengurus Yayasan Perguruan Cikini, ia terlibat dalam film Kadet 1947, diundang dalam peluncuran film 25 November mendatang.

english.deskripsiManajemen: Born in Semarang, December 26, 1938, graduated with a Law degree from the Faculty of Law UI in 1967. Continued studies with short courses at the Norwegian Shipping Academy, Sanderstolen, Norway, and the Seatrade Academy of London, Cambridge, England.

The fifth President of Indonesia who served from July 23, 2001, to October 20, 2004. She is the first female president of Indonesia and the daughter of the first President of Indonesia, Soekarno, who later followed in her father's footsteps to become the President of Indonesia.

Emeritus professor at the Faculty of Cultural Sciences UI, expert in Indonesian linguistics, discourse analysis, translation, and semiotics. Former chairman of the Indonesian Translators Association (2000–2007), member of AIPI, and founder of the Semiotic Circle. Also, an expert in jazz music and a harmonica player.

Prominent figure in the Indonesian National Police (Polri) and academician. He served as the Chief of the Indonesian National Police (Kapolri) from 1978 to 1982, as the Minister of Manpower in the Ampera Cabinet (1966), and was also assigned as the Ambassador to West Germany.

Academic in transportation and alumnus of Technische Hogeschool Delft, Netherlands (1952-1958), Purdue University, USA (1960-1961), and Institute For Theoretical Physics, Trieste (1973). Lecturer at ITB (1959), Instructor at Education Wing 006, Indonesian Air Force (1959-1965), Advisor to the Airworthiness Service of the Directorate General of Air Transportation (1959-1968).
Vice President of the Indonesian Olympic Committee, also active in the Cikini Educational Foundation, playing a role in the development of sports and education.

english.namaLengkapManajemen: Prof. Dr. H. Does Sampoerno MPH
english.deskripsiManajemen: The pioneer of the Public Health Study Program at the Faculty of Medicine, Unsri. As a member of the Cikini Educational Foundation, he/she has made significant contributions to health education and the promotion of a healthy Indonesia.

Soebronto Laras, racer and mechanic known as Yonto, the son of R. Moerdono, the importer of Citroen, Tempo, and Combi since 1949. Interested in the workshop since childhood, Yonto served as the President Director of PT. Indohero Steel & Engineering Co., and PT Indo Mobil Utama, assembler of Suzuki motorcycles and cars. Also, the President Commissioner of the Indomobil Group and Suzuki Indomobil Motor.

Born in Bandung, November 27, 1933, concrete construction expert, founder of Gadjah Mada University and Cikini Educational Foundation. Bachelor of Medicine UI (1955), Bachelor of Psychology UI (1962), Bachelor of Philosophy from Leiden University, Netherlands (1974), Doctor of Philosophy UI (1979).

Prof. Mardjono, Chairman of the Police Science Studies Program at UI Postgraduate (1996—2006), Secretary and Chairman of the Law Science Consortium of the Ministry of Education and Culture (1990—2002). Law graduate of UI 1962, Master of Arts from the University of Pennsylvania 1967.

The speaker at the Workshop of the Assessors Assembly of the Indonesian Institute of Engineers discussed the certification of engineers and performance recording. As part of the management of the Cikini Educational Foundation, he supports a professional culture and the strictness of professional regulations.

The President Director of PT PLN Geothermal, a leader in energy, also plays a role in the management of the Cikini Educational Foundation, demonstrating contributions in the fields of education and energy.

The mining entrepreneur and member of the Cikini Educational Foundation, supporting the success of his wife, Iin Parlina, a legendary singer. In the happiness of their family, both are actively involved in social and charitable activities.

Hoediatmo Hoed, Indonesian economist and professional, served as the president director of PT. Freeport Indonesia, the first foreign capital company in the New Order era. Replacing Usman Pamuntjak, Hoediatmo Hoed was replaced by Adrianto Machribie in 1996 after riots in Tembagapura and Timika.

english.namaLengkapManajemen: DR. Ir. Darwin Cyril Noerhadi, M.Sc
english.deskripsiManajemen: Consultant & Researcher at the Harvard Institute for International Development (HIID) – Ministry of Finance. Doctoral degree in Strategic Management (cum laude) from the University of Indonesia, MBA in Finance and Economics from the University of Houston, and Bachelor of Engineering from the Bandung Institute of Technology.

Member of the Indonesian Medical Association (IDI) and the Indonesian Association of Specialist Doctors in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation (PERDOSRI). He also received education in Child Development and Rehabilitation at the Royal Children's Hospital, Melbourne, Australia.
